messages.content: I don't know. Like, what would be useful for me to talk about regarding the sleeping pattern? Why am I unable to sleep early? Actually, I know that because I don't stop early in the night. Like, why, although I know that, yeah, maybe we can talk about why, although I know I should do that, but I'm not doing that. Like, I know I need to go to the airport early, but I just keep delaying it and going very late, and sometimes missing the flight. Like, this is like quite, from many aspects, I know what I should do, but I just cannot do that. I won't behave accordingly to do that. I don't know why. That is like a curse to me. Like, bad stuff that is hard to be controlled.

non_preferred_output.content: Ian: So, you're discussing about your sleeping pattern and more specifically, why you are unable to change it, despite knowing what you should do. You're drawing a parallel to your ability to take action, like getting to the airport on time, and you're expressing a sense of frustration or curse regarding your lack of self-control.

messages.content: Okay, maybe instead of talking about the sleeping issue, which I've been talking about many times, I'm quite tired of it, maybe let's talk about why I have this behavior pattern that I know what to do, but I just cannot do it, I will keep delaying going to the airport, missing the flight, no need to go to sleep, I don't go to sleep, I want to solve this, I want to be able to achieve what I want, do what I want, control myself properly, it will be really useful if after the session I know the root cause of it, I'm able to resolve it, I'm able to act differently after this talk.

non_preferred_output.content: So, you suspect that you might have a lack of self-control, and you'd like to understand the root cause of this behavior—specifically, why you can’t seem to do what you know you should do. You've named the issue as a lack of self-control, and you're frustrated because you feel like this pattern controls you. You want to be able to do what you desire and have proper control over your actions.
